channel.title: Need help right now, please hurry
channel.description: please im so enraged and freaking weird-ed out and pissed...My miom and dad are married...they're seperated but, i just saw my mom and some guy...in my room...you get it someone pleasee help right now if nobody responds within 10 minutes im leaving...i need desperately for advice...im breaking down...please somebody help

item.description:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:5, topic:105489”]Umm tell your mom how you feel.

Or just kick the door in and start yelling. :P[/quote]
